description: Main source file for a Flutter-based cinematic TV interface. Defines the app structure, theme, home data model, and UI components such as HomeScreen, search bar, action buttons, recommendations, and focus management for TV navigation.

classes.name: HomeData
classes.description: Data model representing the JSON structure for the home screen content, including title, tags, synopsis, hero poster, and recommendations.

classes.name: Recommendation
classes.description: Model representing a media recommendation with id, title, and poster URL.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: Stateful widget building the main home UI with focus navigation, fetching data from local JSON, rendering hero, title, tags, actions, synopsis, and recommendations row.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point that runs the TvApp widget.

methods.name: _loadHome
methods.description: Asynchronously loads home page JSON data from assets and parses into HomeData object.

methods.name: _handleDirectionalFocus
methods.description: Handles focus movement based on TV D-pad direction intent.
